subject: Maritime Accidents and Safety
Oceans and Seas
Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: Team Vestas Wind returned to complete the Volvo Ocean Race after a crash on a reef left the team stranded in the second leg.
snippet: Team Vestas Wind returned to complete the Volvo Ocean Race after a crash on a reef left the team stranded in the second leg.
